tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT REFERENCES conversion_rates(campaign_id),
  impression_count INT,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE conversion_rates (
  conversion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  conversion_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  conversion_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ppc_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
  click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  click_date DATE,
  is_converted BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ppc_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ConversionRates (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
  conversion_date DATE NOT NULL,
  conversion_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE(campaign_id, conversion_date));

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  advertising_platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Clicks (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
  click_date DATE NOT NULL,
  device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  IP_address VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Impressions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
  impression_date DATE NOT NULL,
  ad_position INT NOT NULL,
  ad_size VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE ppc_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_groups (
  ad_group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  ad_group_name VARCHAR(255),
  bid DECIMAL(8, 2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_campaign_id FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ppc_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_group_id INT,
  ad_name VARCHAR(255),
  ad_copy TEXT,
  ad_url VARCHAR(255),
  CONSTRAINT fk_ad_group_id FOREIGN KEY (ad_group_id) REFERENCES ad_groups(ad_group_id)
);

CREATE TABLE conversions (
  conversion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  click_id INT,
  conversion_timestamp DATETIME,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_click_id FOREIGN KEY (click_id) REFERENCES clicks(click_id)
);
